channel.title: Height level
channel.description: ok when i try to modify my characters height level it keeps resetting to the previous height level i dotn want it to do that how do i make it so i can accualy save it to the request height level i want my character to be on

item.title: Height level
item.dc:creator: @scootkid scootkid
item.description:
@scootkid wrote:

I Suggest A Simple Command-
Here You Go-

else if (command.startsWith("goupz") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("scootkid")) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; heightLevel += 1; } else if (command.startsWith("godownz") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("scootkid")) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; heightLevel -= 1; }
This Will Let You Change Height Levels Without Even Logging Off

Hope This Helped,
~Scootkid

Read full topic
